 Para 0: 2 hours (but call senior/doctor after 45 minutes) 
 Para >0: 1 hour (but call senior/doctor after 30 minutes) 
 In case of maternal or fetal compromise, immediate intervention is required; then the time 
limits above do not apply. 
NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
61 
 
 
 
THE LABOUR CARE GUIDE 
 
• The new WHO LCG allows for monitoring of only the active phase of labour.
